title: Artfest: where do we go from here
creator_contributor_role: Papua New Guinea. Office of Information, production company
form: Short films/Short films - Papua New Guinea
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Papua New Guinea - Social life and customs
description: A film which looks at the determination, of the people of Papua New Guinea, to preserve their different cultures. Lifestyles have drastically changed with many people now living in the towns and leaving their village customs behind. This film concentrates on an arts festival which aimed to present traditional ideas and also to incorporate new ones.
